name: Unseen Characters Online Quiz | TV & Movies Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
'MASH'.

	The wives of B.J. and Potter, respectively.(Peg is actually seen briefly in an episode or two).

questions.text: Hughie is a character in a play by what author?
questions.explanation:
Eugene O'Neill.

	The play is also called 'Hughie'.

questions.text: Skipper is a character in a play by what author?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee Williams.

	Brick's 'friend' in 'Cat on a Hot Tin Roof'.

questions.text: Mrs. Thorvald and Mrs. Elster are associated with ...?
questions.explanation:
Alfred Hitchcock.

	These women were the victims in 'Rear Window' and 'Vertigo'.

'Three's Company'.

	The roommate who preceded Jack. (Actually, she was seen in one episode.)

questions.text: Bunbury is a character in a play by what author?
questions.explanation:
Oscar Wilde.

	'The Importance of Being Earnest'. The character actually doesn't exist - but he's impersonated in the play.

questions.text: Dixie Wells is a character in a movie that stars ...?
questions.explanation:
Montgomery Clift.

	The fighter that Clift's character blinded in 'From Here to Eternity'.
